game.name: Flappy Dragon 2
game.description: Flappy Dragon 2 is endless runner game. You are playing as a dragon, that are flying through the landscape. As the dragon you will have to avoid obstacles and collect gems. The gems can be used to increase your top score and buy items in the shop.
game.metaTitle: Flappy Dragon 2, Flying Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Flappy Dragon 2 at atmegame.com ! We have selected this flying games for best excitement and thrill in you!
game.metaKeyword: Flappy Dragon 2 Game, Action Games,  Game, Online Games, Play Free Games, Flash Games, Browser Game
game.mobileControlKeys: TAP O THE SCREEN TO FLY
game.webControlKeys: L CLICK OF MOUSE TO FLY
